column5: Hi all!!!!  We have created a Facebook group for Pete Maina so that we can keep you updated on his events and such. If you are interested just sign into Facebook and search the groups for Pete Maina.  I am also putting some videos up there. I am currently uploading Marc Thorpe!!!!!!!  -Jen   P.S. Hi Marc!!!!
OH oh oh I FORGOT!!!!!  Marc the attached photo is just for you!!!   -Jen
Oh Ya Twitty With a look like that he may even make the audition for the village people

Gee, thanks a lot Jen. You really have a knack for ruining someone's breakfast. And tell Pete that that pink hat rolled up country style looks a little better but the color really takes away from his swarthy, chiseled features.  Thanks for the morning smile.
Thanks Jen  I'm a regular facebook user and will definitely add the group.  cheers
There is also a Ontario fishing.net group. http://www.facebook.com/home.php?ref=home#...?gid=6345311388
I KNEW you would like it Marc!!!!!!  Thanks for the group tips!!! I put up some GREAT videos on Pete's!! And just joined this one.  -Jen
I figured out how to get the group link. http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=76754615567
